definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Huxley was an exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 赫胥黎是达尔文进化论的鼓吹者。

sentences.english: These are the creatures that provided Darwin with the flash of imagination that led to his theory of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 这也是让达尔文灵光一现，想到了进化论的生物。

sentences.english: She said my understanding of Darwinism needed some fine-tuning.
sentences.chinese: 她说我对进化论的理解需要一些微调。

sentences.english: Its thoughts of historical science have the views of historical evolutionism.
sentences.chinese: 史学思想具有历史进化论的观点。

sentences.english: Evolutionary literary viewpoint is the cornerstone of the literary revolution.
sentences.chinese: 进化论文学观是文学革命的理论基石。

sentences.english: I was an atheist and evolutionist most of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我大半辈子都是个无神论进化论者。

sentences.english: It has been supposed that Darwin renounced evolution on his deathbed.
sentences.chinese: 有人认为达尔文临死时否定了进化论。

sentences.english: Some antievolution authors have published papers in serious journals.
sentences.chinese: 有些反对进化论的作者曾在严肃刊物上发表过论文。

sentences.english: There are various ways in which the known facts about evolution can be reconciled with theistic religions.
sentences.chinese: 有许多方法可以让进化论和宗教和谐共存。

sentences.english: Memetics is a theory originated from Darwin's biological evolution theory.
sentences.chinese: 模因论是基于达尔文生物进化论提出的新理论。
我想我们大家都信进化论。

sentences.english: We reject both naturalistic and theistic evolution.
sentences.chinese: 我们反对自然主义和进化论。

sentences.english: Evolution is a continuing topic of debate in some states.
sentences.chinese: 在一些州，进化论是个持久有争议的话题。

sentences.english: Her creative works doesn't have the colour of historical evolutionism.
sentences.chinese: 其创作不具历史进化论色彩。

sentences.english: How does evolution explain some of these complexities?
sentences.chinese: 怎样用进化论来解释这些复杂性？

sentences.english: READERS in search of literature about Darwin or Darwinism will have no trouble finding it.
sentences.chinese: 想要检索达尔文和达尔文进化论的相关文献并不困难。

definition: Charles Darwin (1809-1882), British biologist and author of "On the Origin of Species" 物種起源|物种起源[Wu3 zhong3 Qi3 yuan2]/Darwin, capital of the Northern Territory (Australia) 北領地|北领地[Bei3 Ling3 di4]

pinyin: she4 hui4 Da2 er3 wen2 zhu3 yi4
